Эта игра ГОВНО

Greatest game since Dig Dug. 

The story follows 4 survivers. Francis is great. After his Rush albums were destroyed, he picks up a gun and rampages through the streets while trying to find a station that won't play Stevie Nicks. Bill is an actor with deminsia who believes he is back on the set of the John Wayne flick, for which he was an extra, "Green Berets". Louis is a hot shot ceo of a fortune 99 company and counter strike pro. Who is looking for his grandmothers medicine. And last but not least. Zoey. 

The gameplay is fantastic only matched in quality by Oregon Trail.

And you can really tell Hank Williams Jr. put a lot of effort into composing this  masterful soundtrack.


All in all its a 3 from a 1 out of 10.

Left4dead первая часть это классика.. Эта игра подходит идеально и для парней и для девушек, все любители фильмо ужасов вроде( Обитель зла, рассвет мертвецов, зомбиленд и.т.д) обязательно должны в нее сыграть.. И что же в этой игре все-таки есть интересное? С виду посмотришь.. маленький арсенал оружия, намного меньше карт, чем во второй части, намного меньше людей играет.. А все же почему? Да потому-что если раньше в далеком 2009 году ты стоишь отстреливаешься бедненький от двух зомбей еле-еле карабкаешься до убежища, то с опытом ты можешь спокойной заблеванных в толпе зомбей убить ведьму, двух хантов и при этом почти не теряя хп!! Да скажу сразу главный минус l4d это его комьюнити.. остались здесь в основном только ПРО!!! Повторюсь, что это означает, что даже самый новенький игрок здесь имеет от 1000 часов в эту игру.. А разница между ПРО и новичком настолько большая.. что новичку после первого захода в игру будет тяжко еще наверно 1.5 года :D если постоянно в нее играть.. Но в целом в л4д очень много изюменок.. Эти непередаваемые ощущения когда 4 человека сидят в скайпе обсуждают тактику, это КУЧА эмоций положительных эмоций, это адреналин в крови бурлит.. До сих пор зашкаливает пульс, когда ты остаешься один на один против танка.. Дак к чему же это я все? Ни в одной другой игре, вы никогда не испытаете столько страха и в то же время адреналина, как в л4д... мм и еще немного все таки Game of the year 2010 =)
Amazingly fun game, AI needs a bit of work. 8.5/10

Старый добрый Left 4 Dead.
Для одиночек это - игра на расслабление, если на работе проблемы. 
Все просто как 2x2=4. Бегай и убивай зомби. Зомби тут, кстати, бывают разных видов. Аптечки, скромный выбор оружия, взаимовыручка. Миссии примитивны: пробеги карту и не умри. Впрочем, а что еще требовать от хоррор шутера? Игра проста в освоении, не требует никаких навыков. Разве что повышение сложности может доставить вам несколько проблем с прохождением. 
А вот кооператив на сражении - это уже веселее. 
Глупые тиммейты, кстати, тоже смогут подлить масла в огонь. Теперь игра строится на взаимоотношении игроков. Как они побегут, будут ли помогать друг другу. Для зараженных же открыт простор комбинаций по убийству выживших.
Игра очаровательна.

This game is a pretty fun co-op game, but take note that the steam version (unlike the xbox 360 version) only has online co-op. This was a pretty big bummer to me since I have plenty of bros that I'd want to play local with (with my pc hooked up via hdmi to my tv, of course). So yeah, pretty fun zombie game, but would be better with local co-op. Forget about trying to be stealthy as the cpu players who fill in the remaining 1-3 spots (you have to have 4 people playing it)  know nothing about stealth. Oh, and if you try to do what my friend and I did (killing off the cpu's), whatever you do don't rescue the civilians when it gives you the option as this will only make the cpu's respawn...
Lástima que murió. Pero juegazo.

While not the best horror survival game this game honestly delivers some good thrills. Especially in Survival mode when the tank spawns and you realize, "Oh no! The tank is coming!" and the gameplay is fun and fast. In singleplayer mode it's just as good. Also in multiplayer when your running low on health and the zombies are swarming you it's up to your teamates to save you, so this game includes lots of teamwork. However though while the pros outweigh the cons some of the cons are the fact that singleplayer AND multiplayer both have the same maps. It may also get a little repetive as game rounds do somewhat go the same the A.I can also sometimes be a little stupid, running into walls and sometimes plain out avoiding you, but on that note however Turtle Rock did a great job and I can't wait until their newest masterpieice, Evolve, comes out.

I give this game a 7/10

Я один из тех людей кто играл в L4D сразу после её продажи(играл с другого акка) многие ачивы я открыл ещё в 2009, сейчас добил остальные) Надо быть и 3adrotom, чтобы пройти некоторые достижения, ну и ещё багоюзером хорошим (хотя я больше за прохождение без багов). Но это не главное...
В отличии от 2ой части здесь реально надо быть PRO. Плюс игры, что тут реально страшно в отличии от 2ой части, так как действия все ночью и вечером... И порой не поймёшь кто сидит в углу из-за темноты...
Режим выживания самый сложный, даже похлеще чем эксперт... и именно в этом режиме ты понимаешь, что без хорошо играющих игроков ты не пройдёшь...
Да во 2ой части есть масса оружия и новые особо заражённые... Аптечек много во 2ой + дополнительно адреналин сделали... А 1ая часть учит (особенно в выживании) что у тебя всего 8 аптечек(по 2 аптечки на человека) и тебе нужно пережить 8-10 танков и волны зомби, чтобы получить "Золото" и поставить свой рекорд... И игра учит экономно расходовать то, что у тебя есть...
Жалко мало людей играет в эту игру. Перед тем как начать играть во 2ую часть, пройдите 1ую.

Well, i didn't expect much from this game as it was suggested by a doctor when i was in hospital... yeah strange i know - BOY WAS I WRONG

I was extremely suprised with the detail that went into the game's opening sequence, it immediately got me hooked. Despite the love of Hollywood to turn games into movies, there doesn't seem to be a need for a movie based on Left 4 Dead, as it's already been made several times over, from George A. Romero's 'Dawn of the Dead' to Danny Boyle's '28 Days Later'

I will speak on the single player as thats all i have played so far. In the game, you and three survivors must battle a zombie apocalypse with a simple goal; SURVIVE

Left 4 Dead is about the dreaded zombie apocalypse turning the vast majority of the population into a mindless, ravenous undead hordes. 

A handful of humans remain immune to the zombie virus, and you play as a small group of them. There's Zoey, a young woman; Bill, the grizzled veteran; Louis, the middle-class office worker; and Francis, the biker. Armed with real and makeshift weapons, these survivors must battle their way to salvation. It's a simple plot that anyone can recognize, and Valve pulls it off with its trademark incredible attention to detail.

You battle through to a series of 'safe houses' that lead to a rescue point. The downside to single player is that the bots are passive; you always have to be in the lead, which is problematic when you're hurting. 

Each scenario is presented like a movie, complete with poster If you survive, the "credits" display the statistics for the game, like who killed the most zombies, who inflicted the most headshots, who delivered the most friendly fire, and the like. By now i thought i'd seen it all but what really got me was at the end it says how many zombies were killed in the making of the film. 

Dont let the 'zombies' lull you into a false sense of security - these are based on the 'fast zombies' (think 28 weeks later) - they dont dawdle - they sprint at you with inhuman speed, scale fences, and bust down doors to get at you. Horde zombies aren't smart, but they are dangerous in large numbers. The real danger comes in the form of some special zombies. 

Boy you have to be aware of these... There's the hunter, which can leap across large distances to pin a survivor to the ground. (tricky little bastard to kill - think like a jack in a box with unlimited spring) Then there's the smoker, which has a frog-like tongue that can grab a survivor by the throat, and pull you into or up a building (always listen for the coughing). The boomer is a smelly corpulent zombie that vomits or explodes to spray survivors. Getting hit by the substance will not only temporarily blind survivors, but it drives the zombie horde into a feeding frenzy. (think like catnip for zombies) The tank is just that; built like a brick s*ithouse that can take an enormous amount of damage and dish out a fair amount. And finally, there's the witch, (NOT a old lady who eats little boys and girls); she's an enormously powerful zombie that can take down a survivor with a single swipe.

The game is paced almost perfectly so that you're always pushed to the edge. You'll run low on health. You'll run low on ammo or you'll run out entirely, requiring you to rely on pistols, which have unlimited ammo but aren't as effective as shotguns, assault rifles, and submachine guns. There are pipe bombs and Molotov bombs that you can scavenge, and you can turn propane tanks and gas canisters into weapons. The latter are particularly useful in the many "crescendo" elements in the game. These are points where you must initiate an action in order to open the way forward like having a van drive through a steel fence to open the route. The kicker is that the moment you initiate the action the zombie horde are going to come down on you like a tidal wave. 

The good news is that you have time to prepare and place down gas and fuel canisters If a player falls victim to the zombie menace, you respawn at the last 'safe house' Supposedly as another survivor who has been found (though don't ask why the new survivor is exactly the same as the old survivor)

All in all - bloody brilliant Single Player - Multiplayer i have no experience of as yet
Great game! L4D2 ended up being even more fun so I rarely play this one anymore, but if you can get the two on sale in a bundle you wont regret it! It is classic good zombie rush killing now!

Diversão... Muita diversão neste incrível jogo...

- Leio sobre muitos se perguntando pra quê de comprar este jogo se já tens o seu sucessor?

- Eu respondo de acordo com minha experiência própria: 

=> Caminhos, Detalhes, Jogabilidade, etc..., São fatores completamente "diferentes entre o l4d1 e l4d2". Semelhantes? Sim.. Mas não iguais... Tem muita diferença se compararmos os 2 mapas... <=

- Minha satisfação em tê-lo comprado apesar de já possuir seu sucessor, foi exatamente nesta diferença em que "poucos" percebem que gostei D+...

- Se você jogar com as legendas ativadas (Pt-Pt), verás que o que digo é pura realidade.... As falas são totalmente diferentes e tão quanto engraçadas e divertidas...

- Vale a pena ter estes 2 maravilhosos e divertidos jogos...

- Só tem uma coisa que até é compreensível por culpa de seu sucessor... "Modo Online"...

- É muito difícil encontrar servidores com a mesma disponibilidade do l4d2, mas isto não quer dizer não consigamos um COOP com os amigos ou em um server qualquer....

- Acho ele até mais desafiador pois se você for acostumado a jogar com todas as armas do l4d2, neste você irá sofrer um pouco pois elas são poucas...

- Eu gosto e recomendo à quem ainda não tenha.....

Notas:

O Jogo no total e sua jogabilidade solo ou com amigos: 10/10

Busca por servidores específicos ou variados: 4/10 (existem muito poucas opções e na maioria vazios de jogadores)

I highly recommend this game to fans of co-op games. Even though Left 4 Dead 2 is technically better, the original still manages to be a pretty awesome game in it's own terms. 

The game is split up into a bunch of campaigns, each split into five chapters/levels (excluding two campaigns). The first four levels require a team of characters to progress to a safe house. Along the way, you encounter or are attacked/ambushed by hundreds of zombies, and while they are pretty to defeat, the sheer number of attacking enemies can be overwhelming. Teamwork is a key element when playing on normal difficulty or over. Adding to the enemies are a number of minibosses, which require different strategies to defeat. Some are pretty easy, while others keep you on your toes. The fifth and final level/chapter in the campaign is normally some kind of extraction from the area, which requires players to defend themsevles in a certain area for a set amount of time. It can get pretty intense.

There are four characters to choose from before the start of the campaigns. There's a computer guy, a biker, a war veteran, and a college girl. There's not much of a difference with who you choose, it's more of a personal preferance. But even so, there's quite a bit of dialouge for each character, some for scripted events in the campaigns, and a ton of comments/quotes for player use during gameplay. This is useful for players who don't have a microphone during multiplayer. 

Speaking of multiplayer, there's an interesting versus mode, where some players play as the survivors, while the others take control of the game's minibosses. And not to mention a survival mode.

The graphics are pretty good. Even though this game is from 2009, it still holds up in today's standards. Lighting and flashlight mechanics are impressive. Textures are mostly high quality. Depending on your rig, the game maintains a good-maximum framerate, even when you have thirty zombies running around in your field of vision. I was surprised that the game ran so well, since I have a pretty bad graphics card for gaming. I managed to put almost all settings to max. On the negative side, I see black spots like a radius around fire ingame, although I'm sure it's just my graphics card (Intel 3000 integrated).

All in all, I think this a great game. I myself play mainly solo, but this is certainly best played coopertatively. Worth the money. 9/10.

Отличная игра!

This review is from a single player perspective and if it were from a coop perspective my score would probably be higher.
This game is very fun to play:
- You get to kill a lot of zombies - always a benefit.
- There are  few unique zombies and 2 of them can be extremely powerful on higher difficulty.
- There are few different maps and the game doesn't feel repetitive .
- Working on valve source engine.
- A very good combat system.
- A dark environment - fitting to a zombie game.

This game also get a major con that can be annoying from a single player perspective - the bots AI is annoying for some time and they can get you killed and even make you restart the level.
In addition the game doesn't get a large variety of weapons and can be too dark sometimes (completely dark rooms with nothing in it, not even zombies).

Would recommend this game for both single and coop players but for the coop players you should buy this game with friends because that left 4 dead is dead on the online aspect.

My score: 8/10

Great zombie game with great characters and gameplay. The game will certainly provide plenty of entertainment. The disadvantage that during the game you will meet a variety of players but only need to get used to.

Whether you fancy yourself an intrepid survivor or an infected savage, Left 4 Dead is the game for you. Battling your way through the grim, desolate world is always tense and challenging, thanks to the unpredictable, relentless enemies. It's equally thrilling to play as one of the zombies (aka the infected), coordinating deadly ambushes as you try to kill the survivors. Nevertheless, Left 4 Dead's well-crafted gameplay simply must be experienced in multiplayer

I went into Left 4 Dead expecting it to be mostly hype. I WAS WRONG. This is the best zombie murder game ever made. I highly suggest single player. Your team ALWAYS has your back. You can't say that about real players. Sometimes they jump in your way but it's only because they are trying to get a better vantage point. I suspect you could sit back and kinda watch the game as your team sprays bullets and body parts but why would you? I should have figured Valve thinks of fans above profit. Speaking of, before Steam I had a PS3, two in fact, and wouldn't you know they both took a shit? I may never play another profit hungry console again. Did I mention, BUY THIS GAME.


                                                      4 out of 4
This game is one of a kind! Great shooter to  play with friends!

Кто любит ужастики и зомби посвящается) Не смотря на давольно простенькую графику и анимацию игра затягивает своей динамикой. Есть несколько режимов игры , Компания, Сражение, Выживание. Мне больше всего нравится режим сражения между зомбоками и групкой выживших людей. Тут главное тактика и командная игра, чтобы выжить или наоборот победить выжевших.
